sports.yahoo.com/2015/04/canadiens-end-s.snippet: From Yahoo Sports: The Canadiens advanced to the second round after a 2-0 win in Game 6 against the Senators Sunday night. Montreal now waits to play the winner of the Tampa Bay Lightning-Detroit Red Wings series.

terriblywrite.wordpress.com/2015/04/rega.title: Regarding your word choice...
terriblywrite.wordpress.com/2015/04/rega.snippet: To the writer for the Yahoo! front page: Id like to make a suggestion regarding your choice of words. Its simply this: Dont use in regards to. Its just wrong. Try in regard to or better still, regarding: Filed under: Wrong words Tagged: editing, in...
